snippet.title: Stormworks: Build and Rescue - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Sign up to the free Alpha now - http://mcro.org/stormworks

Stormworks: Build and Rescue is the game where you design and pilot your own sea-rescue service, in a rich and dramatic physics playground.

Steer or fly your custom-designed, block based, programmable vehicles into fierce oceanic storms. Plan and execute thrilling rescues in a variety of challenging crisis scenarios.

Pre-Purchase Now on Green Man Gaming - https://www.greenmangaming.com/games/stormworks-build-rescue/

Green Man Gaming Publishing - publisher of fine independent PC games. Games such as Aporia: Beyond The Valley, Stormworks: Build and Rescue, The Black Death, Stable Orbit, and much more.
